81b5(khri brgyad): cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon
81b6(khri brgyad): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
81b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha
82a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
82a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /
82a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa
82a4(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas
82a5(khri brgyad): gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la
82a6(khri brgyad): gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes
82a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /
82b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang
82b2(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ gzugs ma lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /
82b3(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
82b4(khri brgyad): de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas chos gang la yang
82b5(khri brgyad): yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ste/ rgya che ba phul du bgyi ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ des pa
82b6(khri brgyad): mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /rnam pa thams cad
82b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
83a1(khri brgyad): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
83a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /mtshan ma gang lags zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan
83a3(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/ /sgra
83a4(khri brgyad): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par
83a5(khri brgyad): shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi
83a6(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid
83a7(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ /sa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /ma rig pa ni mtshan ma
83b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong
83b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa
83b3(khri brgyad): nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma
83b4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /tha dad pa brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs
83b5(khri brgyad): pa zhes bgyi'o/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs de bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur lags so/ /dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid
83b6(khri brgyad): ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste/ de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags so/ /de ltar de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / gzung ba ma
83b7(khri brgyad): mchis par bzung bar bgyi ba lags te/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
84a1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de yang ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon
84a2(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa lags par nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du yang
84a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang gis rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par
84a4(khri brgyad): rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
84a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang
84a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du shes pa de yang
84a7(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'
84b1(khri brgyad): las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye
84b2(khri brgyad): shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas/ des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so/ /chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang / gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ des gang yongs su
84b3(khri brgyad): gzung bar bgyi ba'am gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i
84b4(khri brgyad): slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan
84b5(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu mchi bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las
84b6(khri brgyad): mi 'da' lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
84b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i
85a1(khri brgyad): bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchi bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bdun pa/ bcom
85a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
85a3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su
85a4(khri brgyad): mthong na/ de legs par mthong ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing
85a5(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
85a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
85a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
85b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
85b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
85b3(khri brgyad): chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyid
85b4(khri brgyad): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang
85b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan
85b6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems
85b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
86a1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag pa ji lta ba
86a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
86a3(khri brgyad): ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
86a4(khri brgyad): ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
86a5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs
86a6(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di
86a7(khri brgyad): ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /tshe
86b1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral
86b2(khri brgyad): ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
86b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
86b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni
86b5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang
86b6(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ /de ji lta ji ltar bla na
86b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs
87a1(khri brgyad): su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa
87a2(khri brgyad): dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo
87a3(khri brgyad): dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing / rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su
87a4(khri brgyad): mi skye'o/ /de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang
87a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya
87a6(khri brgyad): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes
87a7(khri brgyad): bya ste/ brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas
87b1(khri brgyad): gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags
87b2(khri brgyad): so/ /gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
87b3(khri brgyad): na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
87b4(khri brgyad): shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba'am bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
87b5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba'am/ bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
87b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
87b7(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
88a1(khri brgyad): thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
88a2(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du
88a3(khri brgyad): bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang
88a4(khri brgyad): de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so/ /
88a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
88a6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
88a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /
88b1(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gzugs
88b2(khri brgyad): la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
88b3(khri brgyad): dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing
88b4(khri brgyad): kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
88b5(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig lnga
88b6(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te
88b7(khri brgyad): mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa
89a1(khri brgyad): yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs pa
89a2(khri brgyad): las yongs su mi 'grol lo/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
89a3(khri brgyad): bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
89a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang /
89a5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces
89a6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces
89a7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
89b1(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
89b2(khri brgyad): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang
89b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
89b4(khri brgyad): na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/
89b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams
89b6(khri brgyad): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
89b7(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs
90a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang
90a2(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te
90a3(khri brgyad): chos 'ga' zhig khas len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas len kyang len la/ khas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas
90a4(khri brgyad): len pa yang ma yin/ khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor
90a5(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
90a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len
90a7(khri brgyad): to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de
90b1(khri brgyad): yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul du bya ba/ tshad med pa/ nges pa/ mi
90b2(khri brgyad): 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
90b3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
90b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis
90b5(khri brgyad): gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge
90b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam
90b7(khri brgyad): par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi
91a1(khri brgyad): gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya
91a2(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
91a3(khri brgyad): rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
91a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed
91a5(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
91a6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
91a7(khri brgyad): sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
91b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
91b2(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya
91b3(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya
91b4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
91b5(khri brgyad): dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags zhing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting
91b6(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par
91b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i
92a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
92a2(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
92a3(khri brgyad): bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
92a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes
92a5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i
92a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
92a7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
92b1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i
92b2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur
92b3(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
92b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
92b5(khri brgyad): ste/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
92b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na
92b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs
93a1(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni
93a2(khri brgyad): snyoms par zhugs so/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo / /
93a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
93a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la ting nge
93a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
93a6(khri brgyad): ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
93a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
93b1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi
93b2(khri brgyad): bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing / kun tu mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ des rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
93b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de
93b4(khri brgyad): yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
93b5(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar
93b6(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
93b7(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
94a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /
94a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
94a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus
94a4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po
94a5(khri brgyad): dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
94a6(khri brgyad): phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
94a7(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
94b1(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
94b2(khri brgyad): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
94b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo
94b4(khri brgyad): rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i
94b5(khri brgyad): phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs
94b6(khri brgyad): yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/
94b7(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang /
95a1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma
95a2(khri brgyad): yin pa la mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa
95a3(khri brgyad): nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no/ /
95a4(khri brgyad): ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi
95a5(khri brgyad): shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba
95a6(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de dag ni ma dad pa yin te ci zhig la ma dad ce
95a7(khri brgyad): na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no/ /de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
95b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa
95b2(khri brgyad): yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa
95b3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /
95b4(khri brgyad): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/
95b5(khri brgyad): de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
95b6(khri brgyad): mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus
95b7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang
96a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
96a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags
96a3(khri brgyad): nas mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
96a4(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags
96a6(khri brgyad): shing / ji ltar bskabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
96a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
96b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
96b2(khri brgyad): thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
96b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
96b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
96b5(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
96b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
96b7(khri brgyad): bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam
97a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/
97a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig /rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ tshor ba dang / 'du
97a3(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig
97a4(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /
97a5(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyama'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
97a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
97a7(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug
97b1(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus
97b2(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
97b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
97b4(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
97b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar
97b6(khri brgyad): dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor
97b7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
98a1(khri brgyad): lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang
98a2(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/
98a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ /
98a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
98a5(khri brgyad): lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
98a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom
98a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te
98b1(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /
98b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
98b3(khri brgyad): ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa
98b4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
98b5(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang
98b6(khri brgyad): ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
98b7(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
99a1(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
99a2(khri brgyad): lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /
99a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan
99a4(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so/ /bcom
99a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
99a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye
99a7(khri brgyad): ba'am 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
99b1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
99b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
99b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming dang brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ ming dang brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye
99b4(khri brgyad): bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
99b5(khri brgyad): ji snyam du sems/ gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang gdags pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med
99b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad
99b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
100a1(khri brgyad): pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
100a2(khri brgyad): pa la de ltar slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag
100a3(khri brgyad): lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar
100a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/
100a5(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
100a6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'byung lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /
100a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag ca lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol
100b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag ca ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig
100b2(khri brgyad): yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma
100b3(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma
100b4(khri brgyad): lta bu lags te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de
100b5(khri brgyad): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
100b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la yang mi mkhas par rig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma song na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /
100b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
101a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
101a2(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
101a3(khri brgyad): pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag
