101a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
101a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa
101a6(khri brgyad): med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
101a7(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
101b1(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /
101b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
101b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces
101b4(khri brgyad): bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
101b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
101b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
101b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor
102a1(khri brgyad): rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs
102a2(khri brgyad): so/ /gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs
102a3(khri brgyad): la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
102a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
102a5(khri brgyad): gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba
102a6(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug
102a7(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam
102b1(khri brgyad): du sems so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
102b2(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes
102b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi
102b4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces
102b5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces
102b6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed
102b7(khri brgyad): de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
103a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa
103a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi
103a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
103a4(khri brgyad): gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
103a5(khri brgyad): gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
103a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing /
103a7(khri brgyad): brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
103b1(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam
103b2(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
103b3(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam
103b4(khri brgyad): par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
103b5(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro
103b6(khri brgyad): dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong
103b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi
104a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
104a2(khri brgyad): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus
104a3(khri brgyad): te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /
104a4(khri brgyad): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
104a5(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar
104a6(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin
104a7(khri brgyad): gyi lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lam mo/ /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs
104b1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na byang chub
104b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang
104b3(khri brgyad): zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi
104b4(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
104b5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang
104b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
104b7(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
105a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba
105a2(khri brgyad): dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / /dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
105a3(khri brgyad): yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal
105a4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
105a5(khri brgyad): ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
105a6(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
105a7(khri brgyad): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la
105b1(khri brgyad): gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang
105b2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
105b3(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /
105b4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
105b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
105b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
105b7(khri brgyad): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par
106a1(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
106a2(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi
106a3(khri brgyad): bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos
106a4(khri brgyad): ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
106a5(khri brgyad): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
106a6(khri brgyad): su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi
106a7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab
106b1(khri brgyad): 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
106b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba
106b3(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes
106b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs
106b5(khri brgyad): te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya
106b6(khri brgyad): bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong
106b7(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa
107a1(khri brgyad): nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
107a2(khri brgyad): mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar
107a3(khri brgyad): yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin
107a4(khri brgyad): du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
107a5(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang
107a6(khri brgyad): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
107a7(khri brgyad): byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan
107b1(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i
107b2(khri brgyad): tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin
107b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing / de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang
107b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
107b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
107b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /
107b7(khri brgyad): gzung bar mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /bsgom par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
108a1(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
108a2(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms
108a3(khri brgyad): pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas
108a4(khri brgyad): khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i
108a6(khri brgyad): sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las
108a7(khri brgyad): rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub
108b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do/ /khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no/ /khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so
108b2(khri brgyad): zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
108b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya
108b4(khri brgyad): dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag
108b5(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi
108b6(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
108b7(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
109a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
109a2(khri brgyad): dang lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang
109a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
109a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems
109a5(khri brgyad): dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por
109a6(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
109a7(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te/ rjes su ston par byed do zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang / slob
109b1(khri brgyad): dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang 'bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/
109b2(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig /
109b3(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha
109b4(khri brgyad): dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag
109b5(khri brgyad): nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod
109b6(khri brgyad): pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems
109b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
110a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
110a2(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces
110a3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
110a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
110a5(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
110a6(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
110a7(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
110b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub dang / sems dpa' la skye ba dang
110b2(khri brgyad): yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/ sems dpa' la yang gzhi med de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor
110b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la
110b4(khri brgyad): gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor
110b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
110b6(khri brgyad): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs
110b7(khri brgyad): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor
111a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /
111a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam
111a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
111a4(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
111a5(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
111a6(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
111a7(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
111b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
111b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
111b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
111b4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /
111b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
111b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med
111b7(khri brgyad): do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams
112a1(khri brgyad): la yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab
112a2(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med
112a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
112a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba
112a5(khri brgyad): med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la
112a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams kyi gzhi
112a7(khri brgyad): med do/ /skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
112b1(khri brgyad): 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
112b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
112b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do/ /
112b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
112b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab
112b6(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don med do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab
112b7(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin
113a1(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
113a2(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
113a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ /shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du shin tu
113a4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor
113a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
113a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
113a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'chal
113b1(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
113b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
113b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
113b4(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
113b5(khri brgyad): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /
113b6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa
113b7(khri brgyad): med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab
114a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du
114a2(khri brgyad): chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag
114a3(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go/ /rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi
114a4(khri brgyad): med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
114a5(khri brgyad): 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed
114a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i
114a7(khri brgyad): rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong
114b1(khri brgyad): gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa
114b2(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten
114b3(khri brgyad): pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod
114b4(khri brgyad): pas log par g.yem pa dang / du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog
114b5(khri brgyad): dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /
114b6(khri brgyad): ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po
114b7(khri brgyad): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
115a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
115a2(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/
115a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
115a4(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /
115a5(khri brgyad): rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa
115a6(khri brgyad): brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /
115a7(khri brgyad): de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
115b1(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
115b2(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
115b3(khri brgyad): mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad
115b4(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa
115b5(khri brgyad): dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas
115b6(khri brgyad): btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang
115b7(khri brgyad): spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
116a1(khri brgyad): shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
116a2(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med
116a3(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
116a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
116a5(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams
116a6(khri brgyad): brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
116a7(khri brgyad): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
116b1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag
116b2(khri brgyad): 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba
116b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'jig pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid
116b4(khri brgyad): dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
116b5(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par
116b6(khri brgyad): thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med
116b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
117a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul
117a2(khri brgyad): byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can
117a3(khri brgyad): gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
117a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/ /rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/ byang
117a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
117a6(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go
117a7(khri brgyad): cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
117b1(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa
117b2(khri brgyad): drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i
117b3(khri brgyad): phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par
117b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug
117b5(khri brgyad): bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
117b6(khri brgyad): m ya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung
117b7(khri brgyad): po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myang bar bya'o/ /phyis gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal
118a1(khri brgyad): pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed
118a2(khri brgyad): pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can
118a3(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/
118a4(khri brgyad): gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing des
118a5(khri brgyad): rlom sems su'ang mi byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas
118a6(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
118a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar
118b1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i sems so/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
118b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni chos zhes
118b3(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/
118b4(khri brgyad): gang chos la yon tan dang / phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor
118b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
118b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /
118b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
119a1(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
119a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang
119a3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/
119a4(khri brgyad): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
119a5(khri brgyad): to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis
119a6(khri brgyad): shig / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu
119a7(khri brgyad): dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba
119b1(khri brgyad): dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / dben par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs
119b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
119b3(khri brgyad): lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad
119b4(khri brgyad): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir zhe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta
119b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
119b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems
119b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs
120a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan
120a2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems zag pa med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
120a3(khri brgyad): dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs
120a4(khri brgyad): pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
120a5(khri brgyad): bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
120a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin cad chos gang la yang skye ba'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
120a7(khri brgyad): par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
120b1(khri brgyad): ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
