120b2(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa
120b3(khri brgyad): med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs
120b4(khri brgyad): kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
120b5(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du yang chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med cing / khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i
120b6(khri brgyad): skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med
120b7(khri brgyad): cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor
121a1(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe
121a2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs
121a3(khri brgyad): su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang
121a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /
121a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
121a6(khri brgyad): 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang
121a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med
121b1(khri brgyad): pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas
121b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang /
121b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
121b4(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub
121b5(khri brgyad): kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
121b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba spong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
121b7(khri brgyad): 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags
122a1(khri brgyad): sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
122a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
122a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can
122a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod
122a5(khri brgyad): pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson
122a6(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams
122a7(khri brgyad): bskyed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
122b1(khri brgyad): sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di
122b2(khri brgyad): snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
122b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
122b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs
122b5(khri brgyad): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de
122b6(khri brgyad): ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams
122b7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /
123a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
123a2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang
123a3(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad
123a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
123a5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs
123a6(khri brgyad): sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe
123a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya
123b1(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na
123b2(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
123b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
123b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
123b5(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams
123b6(khri brgyad): mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam
123b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
124a1(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
124a2(khri brgyad): pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su yang mi byed la mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
124a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i
124a4(khri brgyad): phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
124a5(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
124a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
124a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
124b1(khri brgyad): smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
124b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/
124b3(khri brgyad): sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson
124b4(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
124b5(khri brgyad): gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na
124b6(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
124b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
125a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
125a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du
125a3(khri brgyad): shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa
125a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
125a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
125a6(khri brgyad): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
125a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
125b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa sgom zhing / de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
125b2(khri brgyad): dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
125b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang
125b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myong bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs
125b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la ro myong bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab
125b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
125b7(khri brgyad): smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
126a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces
126a2(khri brgyad): bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing bsngags pa yang gsung la ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing /
126a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa yang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa yang mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
126a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
126a5(khri brgyad): rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te
126a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs
126a7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu
126b1(khri brgyad): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du
126b2(khri brgyad): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
126b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun
126b4(khri brgyad): mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang gong ma
126b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/
126b6(khri brgyad): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/
126b7(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/
127a1(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
127a2(khri brgyad): zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms
127a3(khri brgyad): pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa yang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
127a4(khri brgyad): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
127a5(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje
127a6(khri brgyad): chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang rjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la/ rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing / de dag gi ro myong ba dang /
127a7(khri brgyad): nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag
127b1(khri brgyad): gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la yang gnas la 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
127b2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam
127b3(khri brgyad): nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
127b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'
127b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
127b6(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha
127b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i
128a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
128a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
128a3(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dang /
128a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag sgom pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
128a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying
128a6(khri brgyad): rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol pa
128a7(khri brgyad): dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / /sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
128b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems
128b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas
128b3(khri brgyad): shing / nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
128b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa
128b5(khri brgyad): rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad
128b6(khri brgyad): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gi ro myong bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
128b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la/ de yang mi rtag
129a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
129a2(khri brgyad): kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
129a3(khri brgyad): po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
129a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
129a5(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang
129a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug
129a7(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med
129b1(khri brgyad): ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe
129b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa yang mi 'jug la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin pa
129b3(khri brgyad): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
129b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug / gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa
129b5(khri brgyad): yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
129b6(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
129b7(khri brgyad): chos rnams la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
130a1(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/
130a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
130a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang yang dag par gnas la/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
130a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
130a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa'
130a6(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
130a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dris pa dag gis bsgom pa
130b1(khri brgyad): rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan
130b2(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /
130b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
130b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /tshe dang
130b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
130b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad tsam du zad par shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de yang ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
130b7(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /khams rnams dang
131a1(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /
131a2(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs
131a3(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de
131a4(khri brgyad): ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa
131a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs
131a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do/ /bla mar byed do/ /ri mor byed do/ /mchod pa byed
131a7(khri brgyad): do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams kyang
131b1(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par byed la/ de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/ lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed nus pa de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to/ /
131b2(khri brgyad): de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
131b3(khri brgyad): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ shar
131b4(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa rjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa
131b5(khri brgyad): chen po la zhon nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho
131b6(khri brgyad): nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa rjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems
131b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
132a1(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam
132a2(khri brgyad): po bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos/ go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
132a3(khri brgyad): po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
132a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
132a5(khri brgyad): rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang
132a6(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang
132a7(khri brgyad): byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de
132b1(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid
132b2(khri brgyad): bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang / lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
132b3(khri brgyad): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye'o/ /de bzhin du shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang /
132b4(khri brgyad): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
132b5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i
132b6(khri brgyad): sgra rjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
132b7(khri brgyad): rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing / bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin
133a1(khri brgyad): rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
133a2(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/ des
133a3(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul nas/ sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba de dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
133a4(khri brgyad): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas byung bar gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod
133a5(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan
133a6(khri brgyad): 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ go cha chen po bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te/
133b1(khri brgyad): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /des 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed do/ /de bzhin
133b2(khri brgyad): du btung ba dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / yo byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang / gser dang /
133b3(khri brgyad): dngul dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /des zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems can de
133b4(khri brgyad): dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang
133b5(khri brgyad): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo
133b6(khri brgyad): byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
133b7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do/ /de
134a1(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
134a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam
134a3(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing /
134a4(khri brgyad): sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis
134a5(khri brgyad): lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma
134a6(khri brgyad): mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
134a7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i
134b1(khri brgyad): las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
134b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
134b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ gal te
134b4(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang / lag cha dang / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed par mi bya'o snyam zhing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do/ /rab 'byor
134b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar cing bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/
134b6(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
134b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid
135a1(khri brgyad): 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad
135a2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab
135a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing
135a4(khri brgyad): 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ lus dang / sems kyi brtson
135a5(khri brgyad): 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/
135a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du
135a7(khri brgyad): bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab
135b1(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
135b2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud
135b3(khri brgyad): de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
135b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na
135b5(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi
135b6(khri brgyad): mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang
135b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
136a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid
136a2(khri brgyad): nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
136a3(khri brgyad): te/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi
136a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/
136a5(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol lam/ pha rol mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
136a6(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
136a7(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
136b1(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136b2(khri brgyad): la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
136b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag
136b4(khri brgyad): 'khod pa'i sems can dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
136b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa
136b6(khri brgyad): 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang /
136b7(khri brgyad): byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig
137a1(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/ /de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
137a2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa
137a3(khri brgyad): drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na
137a4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/
137a5(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
137a6(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa
137a7(khri brgyad): drug la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub
137b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di
137b2(khri brgyad): snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /
137b3(khri brgyad): 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed
137b4(khri brgyad): cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la
137b5(khri brgyad): dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod
137b6(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
137b7(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
138a1(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu
138a2(khri brgyad): ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
138a3(khri brgyad): pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /
138a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa
138a5(khri brgyad): yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
138a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar dag la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/
138a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
138b1(khri brgyad): kyi slad du sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi ba lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang /
138b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mig ni mig gis stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /
138b3(khri brgyad): chos ni chos kyis stong / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba dang /
138b4(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
138b5(khri brgyad): tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i
138b6(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar gyis stong
138b7(khri brgyad): la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong / go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par
139a1(khri brgyad): bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams
139a2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
139a3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma bgyis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po 'tshal ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis/ ma
139a4(khri brgyad): bshig / mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
139a5(khri brgyad): pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
139a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ gzugs ni mi
139a7(khri brgyad): byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
139b1(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi
139b2(khri brgyad): byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor bdag
139b3(khri brgyad): ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ sems can dang / srog dang / shes pa po dang / /mthong ba po'i bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
139b4(khri brgyad): rmi lam ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /sgyu ma dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi
139b5(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon
139b6(khri brgyad): par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs
139b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs
140a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
140a2(khri brgyad): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor byang
140a3(khri brgyad): chub ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs
