160b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge
160b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge
160b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du
160b4(khri brgyad): byed pa med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
160b5(khri brgyad): yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ shes pa bcu gcig go/ /bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes
160b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa
160b7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/
161a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/
161a2(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid par 'gro ba mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po rnams bcos mar yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang
161a3(khri brgyad): yin pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/ mig mi rtag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag par shes pa ste/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la
161a4(khri brgyad): kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems sems kyis shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la yongs su 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa dang / yongs su zad pa shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la sgra ji
161a5(khri brgyad): bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sgra thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
161a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la mi shes pa kun shes
161a7(khri brgyad): par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po snang ba med pa/ dregs pa 'dul ba
161b1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa ste/ de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag kun shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
161b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ mi slob pa'i gang zag dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
161b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun
161b4(khri brgyad): shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum mo/ /gsum
161b5(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
161b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de ni rtog pa dang
161b7(khri brgyad): bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi rtog
162a1(khri brgyad): mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dag ste/ de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
162a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rjes su dran pa bcu'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
162a3(khri brgyad): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rjes su dran
162a4(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su dran par byed de/ rab 'byor rjes su dran pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni
162a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
162a6(khri brgyad): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi
162a7(khri brgyad): gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
162b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
162b2(khri brgyad): rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud
162b3(khri brgyad): gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/ btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang / shes
162b4(khri brgyad): bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs te/
162b5(khri brgyad): snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
162b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
162b7(khri brgyad): kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
163a1(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam
163a2(khri brgyad): nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
163a3(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med
163a4(khri brgyad): par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
163a5(khri brgyad): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang
163a6(khri brgyad): dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med
163a7(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
163b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan
163b2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/
163b3(khri brgyad): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing / nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge
163b4(khri brgyad): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis
163b5(khri brgyad): gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub
163b6(khri brgyad): pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
163b7(khri brgyad): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
164a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te
164a2(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
164a3(khri brgyad): shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
164a4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams
164a5(khri brgyad): dang / las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi gnas dang / rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa/ khams dum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang
164a6(khri brgyad): zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa dum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / thams
164a7(khri brgyad): cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa
164b1(khri brgyad): dang / sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig gis 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi
164b2(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /phyin chad 'di lta bu med do snyam du rab tu shes shing de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de
164b3(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes
164b4(khri brgyad): dam bcas na/ kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag
164b5(khri brgyad): la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng
164b6(khri brgyad): ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / nga zag pa zad
164b7(khri brgyad): do zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam
165a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du
165a2(khri brgyad): seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang ngas gang dag bar du
165a3(khri brgyad): gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten na/ bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas
165a4(khri brgyad): pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog
165a5(khri brgyad): rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis
165a6(khri brgyad): bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / ngas 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par nges par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsgrubs kyang zag
165a7(khri brgyad): pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir
165b1(khri brgyad): rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram
165b2(khri brgyad): ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
165b3(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i
165b4(khri brgyad): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
165b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas
165b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan nas/ gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
165b7(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / so sor ma
166a1(khri brgyad): brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa
166a2(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las
166a3(khri brgyad): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags
166a4(khri brgyad): ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
166a5(khri brgyad): chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa'o/ /de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni gzod ma nas ma skyes
166a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
166a7(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no/ /na zhes bya ba ni ming mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing sred pa'i 'khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /da
166b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang / dul bar gnas pa yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Da zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /
166b2(khri brgyad): sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /bA zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ya
166b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid las
166b4(khri brgyad): mi 'da' zhing mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tha zhes bya ba
166b5(khri brgyad): ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ng+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos
166b6(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams
166b7(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsha zhes bya ba ni
167a1(khri brgyad): mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /hU zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tas zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad
167a2(khri brgyad): la spro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Tha zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med
167a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ska zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dza zhes bya ba ni rga ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo
167a4(khri brgyad): yin no/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /de yan chad ni yi ger
167a5(khri brgyad): brjod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang gis rtogs par byed pa dang / gang gis mthong ba'i ming ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste chos
167a6(khri brgyad): thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge la
167a7(khri brgyad): mkhas par bya ba 'di shes pa de ni sgra gang la yang thogs par mi 'gyur zhing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par gyur te/ sgra shes pa la mkhas pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes
167b1(khri brgyad): bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos la thos nas kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
167b2(khri brgyad): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de la ni phan yon nyi shu yod pa shes par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brtan pa dang ldan par
167b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang tshegs chung ngus 'thob cing / som nyi med la/ yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag
167b4(khri brgyad): las tshig 'jam po thos na yang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur la/ tshig rtsub po thos na yang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur te/ mtho bar mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la
167b5(khri brgyad): mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rgyu la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas
167b6(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la
167b7(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / 'gro ba la mkhas pa dang / ldog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/
168a1(khri brgyad): phan yon nyi shu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzungs
168a2(khri brgyad): kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
168a3(khri brgyad): zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po la spyod pa ni/ sa nas sar 'phar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pas sa nas sar ji ltar 'phar zhe na/
168a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang yang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am 'pho ba'am/ nye bar 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin pa de la yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / mi sems la/
168a5(khri brgyad): sa yongs su sbyong bar yang byed de/ sa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas pas/
168a6(khri brgyad): sa yongs su sbyang ba bcu bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byas te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ phan pa bya ba'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
168a7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su
168b1(khri brgyad): sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs
168b2(khri brgyad): su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par 'grel ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bden pa'i tshig yongs
168b3(khri brgyad): su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas rtag tu chos brgyad yid la bya zhing de dag
168b4(khri brgyad): la nan tan bya'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa dang / mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
168b5(khri brgyad): mi gtang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis sri zhu che ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas yongs su tshol ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas
168b6(khri brgyad): chos brgyad po de dag rtag tu yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mang du thos pas chog mi shes shing / de
168b7(khri brgyad): la yang yi ge la mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed la/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / yongs su bsngo la des kyang rlom sems
169a1(khri brgyad): su mi byed pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo zhing des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas shing / des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
169a2(khri brgyad): po sa gsum pa la gnas pas/ chos lnga po de dag la gnas par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzhi pa la gnas pas/ chos bcu yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya zhing de yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/
169a3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtang ba dang / bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
169a4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / sems mi 'dre ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongs su gtang bar mi bya
169a5(khri brgyad): zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing / dge
169a6(khri brgyad): slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / bdag la stod pa yongs su spang bar
169a7(khri brgyad): bya zhing / gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / the tshom yongs su spang bar bya ba
169b1(khri brgyad): dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
169b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas/ chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi
169b3(khri brgyad): sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / slong ba mthong na sems zhum par mi bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas yid mi bde bar mi bya ba
169b4(khri brgyad): dang / slong ba bskrad par mi bya ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas/ chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi
169b5(khri brgyad): shu mi bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ba dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang / rgyur lta ba dang /
169b6(khri brgyad): ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa dang / phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams la mngon par zhen pa dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la lhag par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la
169b7(khri brgyad): chags pa dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / chos su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / dge 'dun du lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / tshul khrims su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya
170a1(khri brgyad): bas sgyid lug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po de dag mi bya'o/ /sa bdun pa la gnas pa des chos nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ nyi shu gang
170a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba dang / sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba
170a3(khri brgyad): dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la yang mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs shing des rlom sems su yang mi bya ba dang / mi skye bar bzod pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / chos thams
170a4(khri brgyad): cad la rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa dang / lta ba bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa'i sa dang / sems dul ba dang / sems zhi ba dang / shes pa thogs pa med pa dang / rjes su
170a5(khri brgyad): 'chags pa'i sam yin pa dang / zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170a6(khri brgyad): chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/ chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji
170a7(khri brgyad): ltar mthong ba de dag kyang yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/ rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
170b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa
170b2(khri brgyad): dang / ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub cing / bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi
170b3(khri brgyad): po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ba ste/
170b4(khri brgyad): de smon lam ji lta ji lta bu 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i klung khong
170b5(khri brgyad): du chud pa dang / mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun
170b6(khri brgyad): sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis po de dag yongs su rdzogs
170b7(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
171a1(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis
171a2(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa
171a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/ /de
171a4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ de ni gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
171a5(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing 'jog la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de
171a6(khri brgyad): dag la bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sri zhu byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang
171a7(khri brgyad): ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos tshol bar byed la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi lhung ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /
171b1(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yang rab tu 'byung la/ su yang de'i bar
171b2(khri brgyad): chad byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe
171b3(khri brgyad): na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nams kyang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba
171b4(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs kyang rung mya ngan las 'das kyang rung sems can rnams la
171b5(khri brgyad): chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad
171b6(khri brgyad): pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de ltar byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i
171b7(khri brgyad): sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa
172a1(khri brgyad): nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa gzhom pa gang gis nams kyang rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa
172a2(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba
172a3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /rab 'byor bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang bar bya ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan
172a4(khri brgyad): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / gzhan yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims su byed pa/ byang chub la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag yid la mi byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no/ /
172a5(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phan chung ngu zhig byas na yang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du chud mi gzon na/ chen po lta
172a6(khri brgyad): ci smos te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam
172a7(khri brgyad): par 'tshe ba'i sems med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
172b1(khri brgyad): theg pa gsum po dag la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myang bar bya ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs
172b2(khri brgyad): su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen
172b3(khri brgyad): po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang bdag bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba dag
172b4(khri brgyad): tu 'dug la/ sems can de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bzhag gi bar du der gcad pa dang / gshag pa dang / brdung ba dang / btso ba dang / bsreg pa dag kyang nyams su myang bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi phyir mngon par spro zhing
172b5(khri brgyad): yongs su mi skyo ba'i bar du ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnams
172b6(khri brgyad): la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
172b7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan mi byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
173a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang ci gsungs pa de thams
173a2(khri brgyad): cad gzung bar bya'o snyam du chog mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa
173a3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tha na byang chub la yang re ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa yin no/ /de
173a4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa bdag dang gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
173a5(khri brgyad): su dag par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor
173a6(khri brgyad): ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis nye bar brtan na/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/ sangs
173a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du nams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub
173b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa yin
173b2(khri brgyad): no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la
173b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes
173b5(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo dag la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
173b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtong ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/ gang la bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
173b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i
174a1(khri brgyad): yon tan la smad pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
174a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/ nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub
174a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/ gang rnam par shes pa gnas pa rnams la de'i sems mi sbyor ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
174a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po
174a5(khri brgyad): thams cad la mi blta ba ma yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing ngur smrig
174a6(khri brgyad): gyon pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong
174a7(khri brgyad): dang / dge slong ma rnams dang se go la gtogs pa srid du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing de dag med na yang yongs su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa
174b1(khri brgyad): yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can
174b2(khri brgyad): thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad sbyar bar bya na/ sems can 'di dag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa yin gyis/ 'di la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khyim la ser sna
174b3(khri brgyad): byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
174b4(khri brgyad): yod pa'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi gleng ldang bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa bskyed par 'gyur ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par mi bya ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i
174b5(khri brgyad): gnas yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ gang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / 'thab pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa'i
174b6(khri brgyad): sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la stod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag
174b7(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la stod pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang
175a1(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe
175a2(khri brgyad): na/ 'di ltar 'di dag ni bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod par byed na/ 'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos shing / byang chub lta la ci smos pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de
175a3(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos ci yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ gang gis lhag par rlom sems su byed pa'i lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal
175a4(khri brgyad): spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175a5(khri brgyad): chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ dngos po rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log
175a6(khri brgyad): yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi dngos po yang
175a7(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su
175b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
175b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/ shes bya'i rgya mtsho
175b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /phyin to/ /phyin par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175b4(khri brgyad): chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rang sangs
175b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /slong ba mthong na sems
175b6(khri brgyad): zhum par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas/ yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sems dang po bskyed phyin
175b7(khri brgyad): chad rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin par bya zhing / sems gsog tu mi bya ste/ chos drug po de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yang bdag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /sems
176a1(khri brgyad): can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /
176a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan ma skyes pas/ chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rtag par 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos gang mi skye ba de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
176a3(khri brgyad): ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya ste/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur blta bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
176a4(khri brgyad): na/ 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar
176a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir te/
176a6(khri brgyad): de ltar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar
176a7(khri brgyad): khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems
176b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems
176b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas sangs rgyas mthong
176b3(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos su lta ba la
176b4(khri brgyad): brten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
176b5(khri brgyad): ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par
176b6(khri brgyad): zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas tshul khrims yongs su dag par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
176b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
177a1(khri brgyad): rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir
177a2(khri brgyad): te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi /stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs
177a3(khri brgyad): par mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o/ /de
177a4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
177a5(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po thob pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
177a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
177a7(khri brgyad): thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi
177b1(khri brgyad): skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/ de ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang
177b2(khri brgyad): ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de/ de ni tshul
177b3(khri brgyad): gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang nyan thos dang rang
177b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams cad zlog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
177b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o/ /
177b6(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o/ /de la
177b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil
178a1(khri brgyad): 'khor de dang der lus ston pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o/ /
178a2(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi
178a3(khri brgyad): bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na yang snang zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o/ /
178a4(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig
178a5(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen
178a6(khri brgyad): bkur byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog
178a7(khri brgyad): dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i
178b1(khri brgyad): tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/ bya ba thams cad
178b2(khri brgyad): byed la de'i sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi 'chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar
178b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur
178b4(khri brgyad): ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
178b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta
178b6(khri brgyad): de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta
178b7(khri brgyad): ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
179a1(khri brgyad): mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /
179a2(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub
179a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung bar gyur pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
179a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams byang chub tu bkod nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa ste/ de ni
179a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang
179a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179b1(khri brgyad): po sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / khyim nas rab tu 'byung zhing mngon par 'byung la/ sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum
179b2(khri brgyad): tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba ni/ gser las grub pa/ sdong po ni bai dUr+ya las grub pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma rnams ni
179b3(khri brgyad): rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin la/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang bas khyab par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa
179b4(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
179b5(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya zhe na/ byang
179b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / bag chags dang /
179b7(khri brgyad): mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab
180a1(khri brgyad): 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
180a2(khri brgyad): po dag la bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' zhing / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang
180a3(khri brgyad): bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de
180a4(khri brgyad): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sa yongs su sbyang ba'i
180a5(khri brgyad): le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / //rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der gnas par
180a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs
180a7(khri brgyad): med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ nges par 'byung bar gyur pa med pa'i
180b1(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag
180b2(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams
180b3(khri brgyad): gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gog pa'i dbyings kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar
180b4(khri brgyad): 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la
180b5(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong
180b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs
180b7(khri brgyad): kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
181a1(khri brgyad): zad do/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i
