201b1(khri brgyad): yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag
201b2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa
201b3(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o/ /shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi
201b4(khri brgyad): khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med
201b5(khri brgyad): pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
201b6(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir/ sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o/ /
201b7(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par
202a1(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams
202a2(khri brgyad): cad med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad
202a3(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir/ sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir mig med par rig par bya'o/ /mig med pa'i phyir/

202b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /

203a3(khri brgyad): pa med par rig par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med par rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' med par

206a2(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi

206b2(khri brgyad): gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gang na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/
206b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs lags pas/ de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o zhes smras pa ni rab

206b5(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /
206b6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong / byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing / gnyis sam/ gsuma'am/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ dgu
206b7(khri brgyad): 'am/ bcu zhes bya ba'am/ tha dad du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te/ de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /de la ni 'dod chags
207a1(khri brgyad): dang 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang ming med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba yang mi dmigs
207a2(khri brgyad): so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
207a3(khri brgyad): pa yang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de la ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa yang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang
207a4(khri brgyad): bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs
207a5(khri brgyad): so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /
207a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du
207a7(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
207b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong
207b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das
207b3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma
207b4(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
207b5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs
207b6(khri brgyad): dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
207b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
208a1(khri brgyad): pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /mnyam
208a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
208a3(khri brgyad): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /
208a4(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa
208a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams
208a6(khri brgyad): ni mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam
208a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang /
208b1(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar ni dus gsum
208b2(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
208b3(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /so
208b4(khri brgyad): so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi
208b5(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i
208b6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
208b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
209a1(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
209a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas/
209a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag
209a4(khri brgyad): da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa
209a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyid lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/ 'di ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
209a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang theg pa
209a7(khri brgyad): chen po 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/ /brnyes par 'gyur ro/ /brnyes par mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// //
209b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
209b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bskul ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes
209b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan pa'am gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/ /
209b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
209b5(khri brgyad): nang du 'dus shing / yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du
209b6(khri brgyad): 'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
209b7(khri brgyad): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
210a1(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang rtag tu btang snyoms
210a3(khri brgyad): su gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing / yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i
210a4(khri brgyad): chos rnams yin no/ /rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang
210a5(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang /
210a6(khri brgyad): gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos
210a7(khri brgyad): rnams gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
210b1(khri brgyad): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
210b2(khri brgyad): dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa
210b3(khri brgyad): dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang
210b4(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
210b5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin pas/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol
210b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / 'thun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor theg pa chen po yang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
210b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhing / theg pa chen po yang gzhan pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nye bar
211a1(khri brgyad): gzhag pa de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni gnyis su med cing
211a2(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med do/ /rab 'byor de'i phyir theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
211a3(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar khas mi len lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su khas mi len lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
211a4(khri brgyad): gzugs mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom
211a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags so/ /
211a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211a7(khri brgyad): gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis
211b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags na/ gang mngon par
211b2(khri brgyad): grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma
211b3(khri brgyad): grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su ma mchis na/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub
211b4(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar
211b5(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang
211b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su khas mi len pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par
211b7(khri brgyad): rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa
212a1(khri brgyad): yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi
212a2(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su
212a3(khri brgyad): bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi
212a4(khri brgyad): yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di
212a5(khri brgyad): skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam
212a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/
212a7(khri brgyad): ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub kyi slad du
212b1(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum/ mi 'gong zhing
212b2(khri brgyad): yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can
212b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can stong pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas
212b4(khri brgyad): mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs
212b5(khri brgyad): dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /rnam par
212b6(khri brgyad): shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas
212b7(khri brgyad): mi len to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
213a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa
213a2(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
213a3(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
213a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /
213a5(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa yang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dben pa yang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang
213a6(khri brgyad): gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi
213a7(khri brgyad): ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
213b1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su
213b2(khri brgyad): khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
213b3(khri brgyad): dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
213b4(khri brgyad): rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi
213b5(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan la/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang /

213b7(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer
214a1(khri brgyad): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
214a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
214a3(khri brgyad): sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
214a4(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa dang / sangs rgyas
214a5(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar med pa dang / stong pa dang /

214a7(khri brgyad): bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang gzhan ma yin zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med
214b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
214b2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings med pa dang /
214b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /
214b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan/ stong
214b5(khri brgyad): pa yang gzhan/ dben pa yang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
214b6(khri brgyad): bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag ni thams
214b7(khri brgyad): cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
215a1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /nyan thos stong pa dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
215a2(khri brgyad): gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
215a3(khri brgyad): nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang /

215a5(khri brgyad): gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas
215a6(khri brgyad): de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
215a7(khri brgyad): 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
215b1(khri brgyad): bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni mtha' dang / dbus dang
215b2(khri brgyad): mtha' mi dmigs kyang / nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/
215b3(khri brgyad): dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi
215b4(khri brgyad): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /
215b5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par
215b6(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /
215b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha' 'am/ dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid
216a1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha' 'am/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub
216a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
216a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin nam zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes
216a4(khri brgyad): pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
216a5(khri brgyad): shes pa med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
216a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
216a7(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
216b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa med cing / stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag
216b2(khri brgyad): pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
216b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo / /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni
216b4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid
216b5(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
216b6(khri brgyad): theg pas stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo / /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin
216b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pas stong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
217a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi
217a2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag
217a3(khri brgyad): par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/ /gzugs ni
217a4(khri brgyad): tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba
217a5(khri brgyad): dag la dmigs su med do/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
217a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
217a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig ni rna ba la med
217b1(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni lce la med cing mi
217b2(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang rna ba dang / sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rnams la
217b3(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
217b4(khri brgyad): gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /ro
217b5(khri brgyad): ni ro dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg bya ni reg bya dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni chos rnams dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
217b6(khri brgyad): gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de dag la yang de med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te/ yid kyi rnam
217b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de yang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ de ni
218a1(khri brgyad): gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang de bzhin te/
218a2(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs
218a3(khri brgyad): so/ /de la yang gzhan dag dang gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la
218a4(khri brgyad): yang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
218a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad po dag ni sangs rgyas kyi
218a6(khri brgyad): chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
218a7(khri brgyad): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
218b1(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med
218b2(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni
218b3(khri brgyad): so so'i skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
218b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa
218b5(khri brgyad): dang / rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
218b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni/
218b7(khri brgyad): gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med
219a1(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta
219a2(khri brgyad): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi
219a3(khri brgyad): 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /'di ltar 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes
219a4(khri brgyad): bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no/ /ming gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong la/ stong pa
219a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
219a6(khri brgyad): med la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
219a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming
219b1(khri brgyad): tsam ste/ ming la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i
219b2(khri brgyad): phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / dngos po med
219b3(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang nang stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
219b4(khri brgyad): dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na
219b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang dran pa nye
219b6(khri brgyad): bar gzhag pa rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
219b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
220a1(khri brgyad): brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
220a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/
220a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi
220a4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe
220a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang /
220a6(khri brgyad): byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor
220a7(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin
220b1(khri brgyad): du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du
220b2(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/

220b4(khri brgyad): la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs
220b5(khri brgyad): na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol
220b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
220b7(khri brgyad): pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi
221a1(khri brgyad): dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
221a2(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
221a3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
221a4(khri brgyad): nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par
221a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bdag bdag ces bya ba yang bdag
221a6(khri brgyad): mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
221a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo
221b1(khri brgyad): nyid med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
221b2(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
221b3(khri brgyad): dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus
221b4(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
221b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas
221b6(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
221b7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad
222a1(khri brgyad): ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos
222a2(khri brgyad): po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma
222a3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang
222a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
222a5(khri brgyad): bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma
222a6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs
222a7(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa
222b1(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs
222b2(khri brgyad): de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /tshor ba dang /
222b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
222b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
222b5(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /
222b6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang
222b7(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa
223a1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du
223a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing / 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur
223a3(khri brgyad): ba med do/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa
223a4(khri brgyad): de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/
223a6(khri brgyad): de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ kho bos 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams
223a7(khri brgyad): par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so
223b1(khri brgyad): zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar
223b2(khri brgyad): na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
223b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de
223b4(khri brgyad): ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan
223b5(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang
223b6(khri brgyad): yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'god zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
223b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /
224a1(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224a3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe tshor ba
224a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe/ mig khas
224a5(khri brgyad): mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / /yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid
224a6(khri brgyad): de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs
224a7(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par
224b1(khri brgyad): mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes
224b2(khri brgyad): 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing / /mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ /mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi
224b3(khri brgyad): bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni
224b4(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
224b5(khri brgyad): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen
224b6(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs
224b7(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / /'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub
225a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
225a2(khri brgyad): cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
225a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i
225a4(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma
225a5(khri brgyad): lags so/ /mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin
225a6(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni
225a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma
225b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma
225b2(khri brgyad): mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis
225b3(khri brgyad): lags so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
225b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /
225b5(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin
225b6(khri brgyad): nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du
225b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
