226a1(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
226a2(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma
226a3(khri brgyad): mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma
226a4(khri brgyad): mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
226a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
226a6(khri brgyad): lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
226a7(khri brgyad): dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /
226b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/
226b2(khri brgyad): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha
226b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
226b4(khri brgyad): dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /de bzhin du dngos po
226b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
226b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
226b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
227a1(khri brgyad): 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
227a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer
227a3(khri brgyad): ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so/ /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi
227a4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib
227a5(khri brgyad): pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags
227a6(khri brgyad): pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
227a7(khri brgyad): pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis
227b1(khri brgyad): su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o/ / //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di
227b2(khri brgyad): dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes
227b3(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she
227b4(khri brgyad): na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
227b5(khri brgyad): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
227b6(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang
227b7(khri brgyad): dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg
228a1(khri brgyad): bya rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa
228a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
228a3(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
228a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba
228a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ba
228a6(khri brgyad): ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad po dag las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
228a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
228b1(khri brgyad): 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya
228b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi
228b3(khri brgyad): rtog go/ /gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /
228b4(khri brgyad): gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang /
228b5(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi
228b6(khri brgyad): rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi
228b7(khri brgyad): rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi
229a1(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
229a2(khri brgyad): mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag
229a3(khri brgyad): ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog
229a4(khri brgyad): go/ /dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
229a5(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang /
229a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes
229a7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/
229b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs
229b2(khri brgyad): kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
229b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas
229b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan
229b5(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
229b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang
229b7(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan
230a1(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /
230a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /
230a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos
230a4(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
230a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin
230a6(khri brgyad): du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
230a7(khri brgyad): chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam
230b1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba
230b2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
230b3(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
230b4(khri brgyad): ma lags zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
230b5(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid
230b6(khri brgyad): gcig pa'o/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
230b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ /de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang
231a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin
231a2(khri brgyad): pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams
231a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ khyod 'di skad du gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
231a4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
231a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
231a6(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes
231a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa
231b1(khri brgyad): nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ skye ba med pa yang
231b2(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /
231b3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag
231b4(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bdag
231b5(khri brgyad): gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba
231b6(khri brgyad): po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
231b7(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /
232a2(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
232a3(khri brgyad): lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam
232a4(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i
232a5(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang
232a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar
232a7(khri brgyad): na/ gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/ skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa
232b1(khri brgyad): rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
232b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad skye ba med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
232b3(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
232b4(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
232b5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang / nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams
232b6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gro ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga yang thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin
232b7(khri brgyad): na/ ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i
233a1(khri brgyad): phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
233a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
233a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par
233a4(khri brgyad): mi 'dod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba
233a5(khri brgyad): med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do/ /de ci'i
233a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed
233a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji
233b1(khri brgyad): ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la yang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes
233b2(khri brgyad): bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skye ba med
233b3(khri brgyad): pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe
233b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/
233b5(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/
233b6(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong
233b7(khri brgyad): ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'a'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang
234a1(khri brgyad): med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang med/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang med/ dgra bcom pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
234a2(khri brgyad): 'byor 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/ skye ba med pa'ang de lta yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis
234a3(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye ba'ang mi skye la skye ba med pa'ang mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs
234a4(khri brgyad): sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa yang brjod par spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos
234a5(khri brgyad): ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do/ /chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa
234a6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di
234a7(khri brgyad): ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa yang skye ba med/ spobs pa yang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang
234b1(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /chos ni skye ba med pa'o/ /gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med
234b2(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
234b3(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
234b4(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do/ /
234b5(khri brgyad): spobs pa skye ba med do/ /chos skye ba med do/ /gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
234b6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
234b7(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis
235a1(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad
235a2(khri brgyad): kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med pa'i
235a3(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi
235a4(khri brgyad): 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
235a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong
235a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/ /
235a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang /
235b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
235b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye'am/ skyes pa'i chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma skyes pa yang mi skye la/ skyes pa yang mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skyes pa gang yin pa dang ma
235b3(khri brgyad): skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba
235b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
235b5(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang /
235b6(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ brjod pa skye ba med/ spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skye ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par
235b7(khri brgyad): spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i
236a1(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
236a2(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang
236a3(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med
236a4(khri brgyad): par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
236a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong
236a6(khri brgyad): ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med
236a7(khri brgyad): par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
236b1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis
236b2(khri brgyad): ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
236b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
236b4(khri brgyad): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams dang / mi
236b5(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe
236b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ chos thams cad ni rang
236b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
237a1(khri brgyad): par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / ting
237a2(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
237a3(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
237a4(khri brgyad): bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
237a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/ rab
237a6(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag tu gyur cing / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / 'dron pa dang / slongs mo pa zas
237a7(khri brgyad): 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog /me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng / spos 'dod pa rnams la ni
237b1(khri brgyad): spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ mal cha dang stan 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/ 'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshog chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sman/ mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i
237b2(khri brgyad): bar dag sbyin par byed cing / bu 'dod pa rnams la ni bu sbyin par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni bu mo sbyin par byed/ chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par byed/ rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo
237b3(khri brgyad): sbyin par byed/ mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin par byed/ yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par byed/ sha dang / khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang sbyin par byed la de yang gnas shing
237b4(khri brgyad): yongs su gtong bar byed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /bdag ni ser sna med pa'o/ /bdag ni sbyin bdag go/ /bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas
237b5(khri brgyad): kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o snyam du sems shing sbyin pa de yang byin nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di la yang
237b6(khri brgyad): bde bar 'gyur zhing / len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /de ni chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
237b7(khri brgyad): bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/ chags pa gsum po de dag la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
238a1(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags shing mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor
238a2(khri brgyad): gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ bdag tu mi dmigs/ len par mi dmigs/ sbyin par mi dmigs shing / de
238a3(khri brgyad): de'i rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin
238a4(khri brgyad): pa na/ sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la snyoms par byed kyang sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs/ bdag kyang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs la/ sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing / byang
238a5(khri brgyad): chub kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags
238a6(khri brgyad): la 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// //
238a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'jig rten pa'i yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
238b1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do/ /zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de yang bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing /
238b2(khri brgyad): de bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ste/ dmigs pa la gnas nas/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po'am/ zin pa'am/ ma zin pa'am/ ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing / lus dang / ngag dang sems
238b3(khri brgyad): kyi dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag tu lta ba la gnas/ sems can du lta ba dang / dge bar lta ba la gnas shing / tshul khrims dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la bsten pa tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing byang chub
238b4(khri brgyad): dmigs nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / de bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang / bdag dang sems can dang / bzod par lta ba la gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod par byed la/
238b5(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / de lus dmigs shing / bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/ ye shes kyi tshogs
238b6(khri brgyad): dmigs shing / bdag dmigs la sems can rnams dmigs te/ byang chub dmigs shing brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de brtson 'grus rtsom pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / de byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sgom
238b7(khri brgyad): par byed cing / bsam gtan rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ ldang bar yang byed cing / de dag gi ro myong bar yang byed la/ de dag gis
239a1(khri brgyad): rlom sems su yang byed cing / dmigs pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i'o/ /de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs/
239a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas/ stong pa nyid sgom ste/ de dmigs pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems
239a3(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi bsod nams thams cad la
239a4(khri brgyad): rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/ thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams
239a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor
239a6(khri brgyad): gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / tshul khrims dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir tshul khrims
239a7(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / bzod pa dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / lus dang / sems dang /
239b1(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / bsam gtan dang / ting
239b2(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas byang chub kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
239b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs
239b4(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba dpag tu med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig
239b5(khri brgyad): rten pa zhes bya/ ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag gis 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'grub par byed pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten dang mnyam pa dang /
239b6(khri brgyad): gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi phyir sbyin pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
239b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis 'jig rten sgrol ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis
240a1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
240a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis
240a3(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
240a4(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
240a5(khri brgyad): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams
240a6(khri brgyad): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i
240a7(khri brgyad): rtsal yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /
240b1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nyan thos kyi
240b2(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin zhing / yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no/ /tshe dang
240b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
240b4(khri brgyad): par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
240b5(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de
240b6(khri brgyad): dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa na/
240b7(khri brgyad): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang sems can thams cad yongs su mi
241a1(khri brgyad): gtang ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ de yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /
241a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa des gnas pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang
241a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
241a4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dmigs su phebs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/ sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong
241a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid du rig par bya/ sems can dben pa'i phyir yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya zhing sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par
241a6(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa
241a7(khri brgyad): nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya/ gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
241b1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa
241b2(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten
241b3(khri brgyad): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / bden pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ yid la
241b4(khri brgyad): byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir
241b5(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa 'di dang / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral lo zhes kho bo smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
241b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya
241b7(khri brgyad): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
242a1(khri brgyad): khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ /'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /
242a2(khri brgyad): 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs
242a3(khri brgyad): mtho/ /dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/
242a4(khri brgyad): rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
242a5(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kho ra yug kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs
242a6(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las
242a7(khri brgyad): srog chags 'bum nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad na yang sems can
242b1(khri brgyad): dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi
242b2(khri brgyad): le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal po chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /
242b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams dang / rab 'thab bral rnams dang / yongs su dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyang / tshangs pa'i bar dag dang lhan cig tu
242b4(khri brgyad): 'dus par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag ji snyed 'khod pa rnams kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal chen
242b5(khri brgyad): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
242b6(khri brgyad): bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang /
242b7(khri brgyad): bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na/ lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad ni lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin no/ /de
243a1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo / /phul du snang ngo / /khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo / /rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med par snang ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i
243a2(khri brgyad): gser gyi gnan lcags nag po ni ka ba tshig pa bzhin du lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin no/ /de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gnan lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad kyang lham me ma
243a3(khri brgyad): yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo / /phul du snang ngo / /khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo / /rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med par snang ngo / /
243a4(khri brgyad): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan
243a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad btsun pa rab 'byor la chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/
243a6(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
243a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/ yid la zung shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas
243b1(khri brgyad): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243b2(khri brgyad): pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ba dag bstan par byas/ lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyis shig /gang
243b3(khri brgyad): dag yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
243b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ kho bo ni dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad mi byed pas de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ste/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o/ /kau shi ka de la byang chub sems dpa'
243b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas gzugs mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
243b6(khri brgyad): stong pa dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / gzhan la rag las pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/ de yang
243b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
244a1(khri brgyad): khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / gzhan
244a2(khri brgyad): la rag las pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
244a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya bar yid la bya ste/ de yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong par yid la bya'o/ /'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/
244a4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen
244a5(khri brgyad): gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de yang mi rtag pa dang /
244a6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong par yid la bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ste/ de yang
244a7(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par yid la bya'o/ /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par
244b1(khri brgyad): shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas
244b2(khri brgyad): len pa 'gag / len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal
244b3(khri brgyad): gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ de yang bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yid la bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /
244b4(khri brgyad): kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
244b5(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
244b6(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de yang mi
244b7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
245a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar chos dang /
245a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams sbyor bar byed cing / rtog sbyor du byed la/ yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed de/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni bdag med cing / bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o zhes so sor rtog par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
245a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin la/ yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
245a4(khri brgyad): sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/ yongs su bsngo
245a5(khri brgyad): ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi sems la med/ yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang
245a6(khri brgyad): yin pa de yang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med de/ kau shi ka gang de ltar chos thams cad la so sor rtog kyang / chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
245a7(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems
245b1(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/ ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi
245b2(khri brgyad): ka yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sems ma yin la/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang sems ma yin te/ de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de yang sems ma yin
245b3(khri brgyad): pas sems ma yin pas ni/ sems ma yin par yongs su sngo bar mi byed la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su sngo bar mi byed de/ de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/ bsam gyis
245b4(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa gang yin pa de yang sems ma yin te/ kau shi ka de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor legs so
245b5(khri brgyad): legs so/ /rab 'byor gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / spro ba skyed pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ste/ byas
245b6(khri brgyad): pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi lags so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa mdzad pa na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad na de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa
245b7(khri brgyad): drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/ yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dgyes par bgyis shing gzhug pa bgyis te bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas pha
246a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug po de la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa
246a2(khri brgyad): drug la gdams par bgyi/ rjes su bstan par bgyi/ yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi/ gzud par bgyi zhing gzhug par bgyi lags so/ /bdag
246a3(khri brgyad): cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/ yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du stsal/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyis shing btsud de bzhag pa rnams
246a4(khri brgyad): ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang
246a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par mi bya ba dag bshad par bya'o/ /kau shi ka gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
