266a5(khri brgyad): bar gyi chos nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan
266a6(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka de ltar chos thams cad ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin pas na/ byin gyi rlabs med pa'i tshul
266a7(khri brgyad): gyis de ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de ni de'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/ /kau shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /gzugs las
266b1(khri brgyad): gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
266b2(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/
266b3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel par
266b4(khri brgyad): 'byung ba las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
266b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
266b6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig
266b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
267a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang shes
267a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab
267a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
267a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
267a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab
267a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar chos thams cad yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med pas na/ gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
267a7(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes
267b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
267b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
267b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
267b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ byang
267b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu med pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/
267b6(khri brgyad): de la bslabs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /'thob par
267b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams
268a1(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor
268a2(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
268a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/
268a4(khri brgyad): de la bslabs nas rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur
268a5(khri brgyad): ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin
268a6(khri brgyad): par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gzugs
268a7(khri brgyad): che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang che ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka tshor ba dang /
268b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang che ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
268b2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang che ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi
268b3(khri brgyad): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba yin no/ /kau shi ka gzugs tshad med
268b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang tshad med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin
268b5(khri brgyad): du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs tshad med do/ /gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang tshad med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
268b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang tshad med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i
268b7(khri brgyad): tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
269a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang tshad med pa yin te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
269a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyang dpag tu med do/ /nam mkha'
269a3(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu med do/ /gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
269a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams
269a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do/ /nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa
269a6(khri brgyad): yin te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu med pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha'
269a7(khri brgyad): yas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
269b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269b2(khri brgyad): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
269b3(khri brgyad): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i
269b4(khri brgyad): dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir
269b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang
269b6(khri brgyad): pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
269b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang pos smras pa/
270a1(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor ci ltar na/ de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ dmigs
270a2(khri brgyad): pa mtha' yas pa yin no/ /dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa yin te/ kau shi ka de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin
270a3(khri brgyad): no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci ltar na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
270a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig yin snyam/ lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
270a5(khri brgyad): de ni chos kyi tshig kyang ma yin chos ma yin pa'i tshig kyang ma yin te/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/ /de ni dngos po med par ming du btags pa'o/ /de ni dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
270a6(khri brgyad): pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su brjod pa yod snyam 'am/ lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su
270a7(khri brgyad): brjod pa med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du
270b1(khri brgyad): sems/ de la sems can 'ga' yang skyes pa'am/ 'gags pa yod snyama'am/ lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam grangs des
270b2(khri brgyad): na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mtha' yas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
270b3(khri brgyad): tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med rnams dang / drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
270b4(khri brgyad): gyis gang bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i chos 'di ni a la la legs par bshad pa'o/ /a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o/ /a la la chos kyi chos nyid 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum
270b5(khri brgyad): ched du brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams
270b6(khri brgyad): sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang / theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa yang mdzad do zhes kyang gsol to/ /de nas bcom
270b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos
271a1(khri brgyad): gang yang dmigs su med kyang theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa yang mdzad do/ /lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
271a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po
271a3(khri brgyad): dag rgya cher bstan cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
271a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang de bzhin
271a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dmigs su med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
271a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ lha'i bu dag
271a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chos de dag la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yang slob par byed pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
271b1(khri brgyad): po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin no/ /lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi thad na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad
271b2(khri brgyad): ma can zhes bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus na 'dug cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
271b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang bral bar ma gyur/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
271b4(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
271b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang
271b6(khri brgyad): bral bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
271b7(khri brgyad): nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
272a1(khri brgyad): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
272a2(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/ mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin/ mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin/
272a3(khri brgyad): mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
272a4(khri brgyad): dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams 'dus te/ 'dug par thugs su chud nas de dag thams cad dpang
272a5(khri brgyad): por bzhag ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ lha'i
272a6(khri brgyad): bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad
272a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur zhing /
272b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing / mtshan ma med pa la yang mtshan ma med pas glags mi
272b2(khri brgyad): rnyed la/ smon pa med pa la yang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa
272b3(khri brgyad): nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing / mtshan ma med pa la yang mtshan ma med pas glags mi rnyed la/ smon pa med pa la yang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur
272b4(khri brgyad): ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems
272b5(khri brgyad): can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms shing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
272b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can thams cad la yang dag par yongs su spyad pa dag gis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i rgyal chen
272b7(khri brgyad): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge
273a1(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun
273a2(khri brgyad): chub par ma byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul
273a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
273a4(khri brgyad): dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha bar 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
273a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu bsgoms shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu bsgoms la/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang shin tu
273a6(khri brgyad): bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
273a7(khri brgyad): dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
273b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du
273b2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams dang / lha dbul po rnams dang / mi dbul po rnams
273b3(khri brgyad): dang / yams kyi bro nad rnams dang / bro nad 'go ba rnams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi
273b4(khri brgyad): dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
273b5(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
273b6(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
273b7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu
274a1(khri brgyad): rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs dag
274a2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas rgyun du
274a3(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa 'jig
274a4(khri brgyad): rten na mchis lags so/ /rang byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'jig rten na
274a5(khri brgyad): mchis lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so/ /chos dkon
274a6(khri brgyad): mchog 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba
274a7(khri brgyad): bar bgyi ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
274b1(khri brgyad): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bar du 'jig rten na yod pa yin no/ /kau shi ka de lta bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
274b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rgyun mi 'chad par bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ rjed par bya/ mchod par bya zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsti stang du bya ba
274b3(khri brgyad): dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa de dag ni nga la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa yin te/ kau shi ka de lta bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
274b4(khri brgyad): rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ rjed par bya/ mchod par bya zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos dang /
274b5(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas sha stag gis/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
274b6(khri brgyad): zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas pa bas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba gcig cig la bsti
274b7(khri brgyad): stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid snga ma bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
275a1(khri brgyad): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
275a2(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka de lta bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/
275a3(khri brgyad): rjed par bya/ mchod par bya zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u gnyis pa ste/ nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu
275a4(khri brgyad): rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ngam/ bcangs sam/ klags sam/ kun chub par
275a5(khri brgyad): bgyis sam/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur
275a6(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / rjed par bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyid par 'tshal na yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
275a7(khri brgyad): gis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar mchis shing chos nyan par bgyid pa dang / de dag gi chos de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bskyud par mi 'gyur
275b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ming phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe rabs phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa dang / mig phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs
275b2(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul nas gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas
275b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams su mchi zhing der mchis nas kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
275b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
275b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
275b6(khri brgyad): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar gyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid cing /
275b7(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul la/ chos ston par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di
276a1(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin
276a2(khri brgyad): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du
276a3(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom
276a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
276a5(khri brgyad): kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
276a6(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngam/ bcangs sam/ blags sam/ kun chub par byas sam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gang dag thob
276a7(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
276b1(khri brgyad): stsal to/ /kau shi ka gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu'am/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'am/ gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gang la la dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'thab par 'dod/ rtsod par
276b2(khri brgyad): 'dod/ dbral bar 'dod/ 'gal bar bya bar 'dod kyang de dag gi 'thab par 'dod pa dang / rtsod par 'dod pa dang / dbral bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag myur ba nyid du med par 'gyur zhing / 'thab par 'dod pa dang / rtsod par 'dod pa dang / dbral
276b3(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
276b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'bral ba dang / 'gal
276b5(khri brgyad): bar byed par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can
276b6(khri brgyad): du gyur pa'i phyi dang / nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa
276b7(khri brgyad): dang / rtsod par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas le lo can du gyur pa'i phyi
277a1(khri brgyad): dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas rgyun du sems rnam par g.yengs
277a2(khri brgyad): par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'chal ba'i shes rab can du gyur
277a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod cing / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / kau shi ka gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams 'di lta ste/
277a4(khri brgyad): rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / kun nas dkris pas yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang kun nas dkris pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thabs la mkhas pas rnam par bsal
277a5(khri brgyad): nas bsam gtan bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
277a6(khri brgyad): dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bkod cing yang dag
277a7(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du bcug / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig
277b1(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de
277b2(khri brgyad): lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur la/ tshe phyi ma la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du bkod cing / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
277b3(khri brgyad): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phyi ma la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan dang / phan yon yin no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang sa phyogs gang du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
277b4(khri brgyad): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i sa phyogs der ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams sam/ gang zag lhag pa'i nga
277b5(khri brgyad): rgyal can rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal ba dang / brtsad pa dang / 'gal ba bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par dkrugs par mi nus la/ de'i steng du de dag la yon tan dang / phan yon 'di lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang
277b6(khri brgyad): dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis nges par 'byung zhing sdug bsngal mthar byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de/ der srog chags skye ba po
277b7(khri brgyad): sbrul gdug pa bkres pas zin cing / kha zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags kyi rigs 'ga' zhig mthong bar gyur nas/ des srog chags kyi rigs de bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags kyi rigs de'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang / de nas srog chags kyi rigs de 'chi bas 'jigs
278a1(khri brgyad): shing skrag nas/ rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba ga la ba der bros pa dang / sbrul gdug pa des/ rtsi de'i dri tshor nas phyir ldog par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan gyis sbrul gdug pa de'i dug gang yin pa de zil gyis non pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba
278a2(khri brgyad): de ni de ltar mthu dang ldan pa yin no/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ kau shi ka der 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gal bar
278a3(khri brgyad): byed pa dag 'byung bar gyur kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthus de dag myur du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing med par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du med par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
278a4(khri brgyad): ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing / rnam par 'phel bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dag nye bar zhi bar byed cing / rnam par 'phel bar mi byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
